duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the monthly close process and drive material efficiencies in the closing process.
Ensure accuracy and integrity of all financial transactions in accordance with GAAP.
Prepare year-end information for tax preparation and work with outside CPA.
Generate and monitor projections of sales, expenses, and profit against actual performance.
Study long-range economic trends and project company prospects for future growth.
Assist in implementing new ERP system and drive integrations with non-accounting systems.
Retain and develop team members, providing oversight and support in various accounting functions.
Act as point person for IT issues, general HR matters, and general office operations matters.

education_certification.credential: BS Degree in Finance, Accounting, or Business (CPA Certification or working towards certification is a plus)
